xidplus.stan_fit package¶

Submodules¶

xidplus.stan_fit.MIPS module¶

xidplus.stan_fit.MIPS.MIPS_24(MIPS_24, chains=4, iter=1000)[source]¶

Fit the MIPS 24 band

Parameters:
  • MIPS_24 – xidplus.prior class
  • chains – number of chains
  • iter – number of iterations
Returns:

pystan fit object

xidplus.stan_fit.PACS.all_bands(PACS_100, PACS_160, chains=4, iter=1000)[source]¶

  • PACS_160 – xidplus.prior class
  • chains – number of chains
  • iter – number of samples

Module contents¶

xidplus.stan_fit.get_stancode(model_file)[source]¶

Check if exisiting compiled stan code exists and matches current git version, otherwise compile and save.

Parameters:model_file – filename of stan model
Returns:compiled stan code
